00013 //! file-based implementation of Store interface
00014 class CRYPTOPP_DLL FileStore : public Store, private FilterPutSpaceHelper, public NotCopyable
00015 {
00016 public:
00017         class Err : public Exception
00018         {
00019         public:
00020                 Err(const std::string &s) : Exception(IO_ERROR, s) {}
00021         };
00022         class OpenErr : public Err {public: OpenErr(const std::string &filename) : Err("FileStore: error opening file for reading: " + filename) {}};
00023         class ReadErr : public Err {public: ReadErr() : Err("FileStore: error reading file") {}};
00024 
00025         FileStore() : m_stream(NULL) {}
00026         FileStore(std::istream &in)
00027                 {StoreInitialize(MakeParameters(Name::InputStreamPointer(), &in));}
00028         FileStore(const char *filename)
00029                 {StoreInitialize(MakeParameters(Name::InputFileName(), filename));}
00030 #if defined(CRYPTOPP_UNIX_AVAILABLE) || _MSC_VER >= 1400
00031         //! specify file with Unicode name. On non-Windows OS, this function assumes that setlocale() has been called.
00032         FileStore(const wchar_t *filename)
00033                 {StoreInitialize(MakeParameters(Name::InputFileNameWide(), filename));}
00034 #endif
00035 
00036         std::istream* GetStream() {return m_stream;}
00037 
00038         lword MaxRetrievable() const;
00039         size_t TransferTo2(BufferedTransformation &target, lword &transferBytes, const std::string &channel=DEFAULT_CHANNEL, bool blocking=true);
00040         size_t CopyRangeTo2(BufferedTransformation &target, lword &begin, lword end=LWORD_MAX, const std::string &channel=DEFAULT_CHANNEL, bool blocking=true) const;
00041         lword Skip(lword skipMax=ULONG_MAX);
00042 
00043 private:
00044         void StoreInitialize(const NameValuePairs &parameters);
00045         
00046         member_ptr<std::ifstream> m_file;
00047         std::istream *m_stream;
00048         byte *m_space;
00049         size_t m_len;
00050         bool m_waiting;
00051 };

00053 //! file-based implementation of Source interface
00054 class CRYPTOPP_DLL FileSource : public SourceTemplate<FileStore>
00055 {
00056 public:
00057         typedef FileStore::Err Err;
00058         typedef FileStore::OpenErr OpenErr;
00059         typedef FileStore::ReadErr ReadErr;
00060 
00061         FileSource(BufferedTransformation *attachment = NULL)
00062                 : SourceTemplate<FileStore>(attachment) {}
00063         FileSource(std::istream &in, bool pumpAll, BufferedTransformation *attachment = NULL)
00064                 : SourceTemplate<FileStore>(attachment) {SourceInitialize(pumpAll, MakeParameters(Name::InputStreamPointer(), &in));}
00065         FileSource(const char *filename, bool pumpAll, BufferedTransformation *attachment = NULL, bool binary=true)
00066                 : SourceTemplate<FileStore>(attachment) {SourceInitialize(pumpAll, MakeParameters(Name::InputFileName(), filename)(Name::InputBinaryMode(), binary));}
00067 #if defined(CRYPTOPP_UNIX_AVAILABLE) || _MSC_VER >= 1400
00068         //! specify file with Unicode name. On non-Windows OS, this function assumes that setlocale() has been called.
00069         FileSource(const wchar_t *filename, bool pumpAll, BufferedTransformation *attachment = NULL, bool binary=true)
00070                 : SourceTemplate<FileStore>(attachment) {SourceInitialize(pumpAll, MakeParameters(Name::InputFileNameWide(), filename)(Name::InputBinaryMode(), binary));}
00071 #endif
00072 
00073         std::istream* GetStream() {return m_store.GetStream();}
00074 };

00076 //! file-based implementation of Sink interface
00077 class CRYPTOPP_DLL FileSink : public Sink, public NotCopyable
00078 {
00079 public:
00080         class Err : public Exception
00081         {
00082         public:
00083                 Err(const std::string &s) : Exception(IO_ERROR, s) {}
00084         };
00085         class OpenErr : public Err {public: OpenErr(const std::string &filename) : Err("FileSink: error opening file for writing: " + filename) {}};
00086         class WriteErr : public Err {public: WriteErr() : Err("FileSink: error writing file") {}};
00087 
00088         FileSink() : m_stream(NULL) {}
00089         FileSink(std::ostream &out)
00090                 {IsolatedInitialize(MakeParameters(Name::OutputStreamPointer(), &out));}
00091         FileSink(const char *filename, bool binary=true)
00092                 {IsolatedInitialize(MakeParameters(Name::OutputFileName(), filename)(Name::OutputBinaryMode(), binary));}
00093 #if defined(CRYPTOPP_UNIX_AVAILABLE) || _MSC_VER >= 1400
00094         //! specify file with Unicode name. On non-Windows OS, this function assumes that setlocale() has been called.
00095         FileSink(const wchar_t *filename, bool binary=true)
00096                 {IsolatedInitialize(MakeParameters(Name::OutputFileNameWide(), filename)(Name::OutputBinaryMode(), binary));}
00097 #endif
00098 
00099         std::ostream* GetStream() {return m_stream;}
00100 
00101         void IsolatedInitialize(const NameValuePairs &parameters);
00102         size_t Put2(const byte *inString, size_t length, int messageEnd, bool blocking);
00103         bool IsolatedFlush(bool hardFlush, bool blocking);
00104 
00105 private:
00106         member_ptr<std::ofstream> m_file;
00107         std::ostream *m_stream;
00108 };
